my london carbon neutral plan 12m fixed september 2020 v2
results.description: London Power's great value, greenest plan. 100% renewable electricity plus carbon offsetting if your household uses gas. This plan fixes your unit rates and standing charges for 12 months. There are no exit fees, so if you change your mind, you're in control.

results.full_name: my london tree plan 12m fixed september 2020 v1
results.description: London Power's great value, greenest plan. 100% renewable electricity, carbon offsetting if your household uses gas AND you'll be helping your local environment as we'll plant trees on your behalf in London. This plan fixes your unit rates and standing charges for 12 months. There are no exit fees, so if you change your mind, you're in control.

Super Green Octopus 12M Fixed September 2020 v2
results.description: This 12 month fixed tariff is the very greenest you can be with Octopus! The electricity you use is 100% matched by renewable sources, and any gas you use is fully carbon offset through our partner Renewable World. Like all our tariffs, Super Green Octopus has no exit fees.
